description:
Yamato Morinosuke is the founder and chairman of Yamato Constructions. An old man who worked his way to the top from being a construction worker, he is not afraid of a scrap or two. He enjoys fishing.
Stranded with a dead engine on one of his fishing trips, with the tide carrying him out, he had given up hope when Kintarou came swimming to save him. In return, he promises Kintarou a salaryman position in his firm, and it all begins ...
name: Yamato Morinosuke
